Posts.Content: i was in 98 had breast cancer removed lumptoctomy done with radiation now sept of 2013 they found a 7mm in left breast again around the last one which was at 12 oclock im now being sent for a biopsy but im afraid as for breast cancer in past of family has had  my sister as well should i be afraid its back after 15 yrs of remission im always tired to
Posts.Title: i have a 7 mm in left breast
